article_title: IRS Oversees Taxes And Obamacare. Now Warren Buffett Wants IRS In Welfare Too

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: Warren Buffett says IRS tax credits are better than raising the minimum wage. But the IRS pays out billions in fraudulent claims and can't administer all the programs it has.
